overview: With over 20 years of software sales leadership, John comes to eIQ from Segue Software where he served as Senior Vice President, Worldwide Sales. While at Segue, he oversaw rapid license revenue growth until its acquisition by Borland Software in April 2006. Before Segue, John was Vice President of Worldwide Sales for Pedestal Software, an information security and compliance company, acquired by Altiris in March 2005. As VP of Sales for Empirix, a recognized name in the software testing market, he led the sales organization from its start-up stage as RSW Software, a Teradyne company, through five years of growth which led to the acquisition that formed Empirix. John earned his BA degree in Finance from Providence College.
